title: Can ChatGPT and DeepSeek help cancer patients: A comparative study of artificial intelligence models in clinical decision support
details: M Sun, J Yu, JW Zhou, M Ye, F Ye, M Ding - Artificial Intelligence in Cancer, 2025
abstract: BACKGROUND Cancer care faces challenges due to tumor heterogeneity and rapidly evolving therapies, necessitating artificial intelligence (AI)-driven clinical decision support. While general-purpose models like ChatGPT offer adaptability …
